text: Lai da Nalps is a reservoir in the municipality of Tujetsch, Grisons, Switzerland. It has a capacity of 45 million m³ and a surface area of 0.91 km². The reservoir is connected to Lai da Sontga Maria and Lai da Curnera in neighboring valleys. ==See also== *List of lakes of Switzerland *List of mountain lakes of Switzerland ==External links== * Category:Lakes of Graubünden Category:Reservoirs in Switzerland RLaidaNalps
title: Lai da Nalps
